document.title: Hot Topic: Regulating So-Called Jake Brakes (2006)
document.abstract: Tennessee cities may regulate, but not prohibit, the use of engine compression braking devices by ordinance; includes sample ordinance.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#132

The content contained in these publications may be outdated, and the laws referenced therein may have changed or may not be applicable to your city or circumstances.
